DOC.brief_title: The Effect Oral Alpha-Cyclodextrin Fecal Fat Excretion
DOC.detailed_description: Alpha-cyclodextrin function soluble dietary fiber , show form stable emulsion dietary fat ratio 1:9 , high affinity saturate fat compare unsaturated fat . In human , supplementation α-cyclodextrin show lead significant weight loss regardless whether energy intake maintain increased.The aim study evaluate result 72 hour fecal fat test use stool marker last three day three six-day feed period . Subjects serve weight maintain diet contain 40 % fat ( 40 % saturate ) , 30 % protein 30 % carbohydrate 18 day . Subjects also consume 1 gram alpha cyclodextrin 1 gram starch , 2 gram alpha cyclodextrin , 2 gram starch capsule form breakfast , lunch , dinner every day three six-day feed period . At dose , alpha-cyclodextrin recognize safe FDA . All stool collect 72 hour period end feed period analyze fecal fat excretion .
DOC.criteria: BMI 20 30 kg/m2 inclusive Weight ≥ 65 kg female , ≥ 55 kg male Pregnant nursing . Diabetes Mellitus Any medication reduce lipid History gastrointestinal surgery , except cholecystectomy appendectomy History malabsorption
